Race.SpecificTitle: Member of School Board -- District  4, Seat A
Member of School Board -- District  4, Seat B
Member of School Board -- District  6, Seat A
Justice of the Peace -- 1st Justice Court
Justice of the Peace -- 2nd Justice Court
Justice of the Peace -- 3rd Justice Court
PW Recreation Tax -- 5 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Ascension, State of Louisiana (the "Parish") levy and collect a tax of five (5) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $5,177,635.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) (the "Tax"), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2024, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating recreational facilities and activities in and for the Parish, with the proceeds thereof subject to being funded into bonds?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Sorrento -- Abolish COP & PD - TC
Race.FullText: Shall both the Office of Chief of Police for the Town of Sorrento and the Town of Sorrento Police Department be abolished pursuant to Louisiana Revised Statute 33:381(C)(33)?

Race.SpecificTitle: FPD No. 3 Prop No. 1 -- 10 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 3 Propositions
Proposition No. 1
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 3 of the Parish of Ascension, State of Louisiana (the "District"), under the provisions of Article VI, Section 30 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, La. R.S. 40:1501 and other constitutional and statutory authority supplemental thereto, be authorized to renew the levy and collection, and adopt a resolution providing for such levy and collection, of an ad valorem tax of ten (10) mills (an estimated $2,060,097.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) (the "Tax") in each calendar year on all property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, commencing in the year 2015 and ending in the year 2024, and shall the avails or proceeds of said Tax be used entirely and exclusively for development, operation and maintenance of the fire protection facilities of the District and paying the costs of obtaining water for fire protection purposes, including charges for fire hydrant rentals and service, and salaries of firemen, and all purposes incidental thereto, within the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: FPD No. 3 Prop No. 2 -- Parcel Fees - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 3 Propositions
Proposition No. 2
(Parcel Fee Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 3 of the Parish of Ascension, State of Louisiana (the "District") be authorized to renew the levy and collection of parcel fees of: (i) $32.00 per year on each lot, subdivided portion of ground or an individual tract upon which is located, either in whole or in part, a residential structure, regardless of whether the structure is being occupied or unoccupied, and (ii) $100.00 per year on each lot, subdivided portion of ground or an individual tract upon which is located, either in whole or in part, a commercial structure, regardless of whether the structure is being occupied or unoccupied, within the District, for a period of ten (10) years, commencing in the year 2015 and ending in the year 2024 (an estimated $470,190.00 reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) (the ''Tax"), with the avails or proceeds of said parcel fees to be used entirely and exclusively for the acquisition, construction, maintenance and operation of fire protection facilities and equipment, including the costs of obtaining water for fire protection purposes and salaries of firemen, and all purposes incidental thereto, within the District?
